title: Connecticut Golf Hall of Fame
text:
The Connecticut Golf Hall of Fame honours people with connections to the state of <a href="Connecticut">Connecticut</a> for their achievements and contributions in the sport of <a href="golf">golf</a>. Founded by the Greater Hartford Jaycees in 1955, the Connecticut State Golf Association took over as custodians of the hall in 1991.
Inductees.
The following are inductees of the Connecticut Golf Hall of Fame.
